description: Primes with consecutive digits that differ exactly by 1.
comments: Or, primes in A033075. - _Zak Seidov_, Feb 01 2011
references: J.-M. De Koninck, Ces nombres qui nous fascinent, Entry 67, p. 23, Ellipses, Paris 2008.
links: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1500
prog: (Haskell)a048398 n = a048398_list !! (n-1)a048398_list = filter ((== 1) . a010051') a033075_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 21 2012, Nov 04 2010
crossrefs: Cf. A010051; intersection of A033075 and A000040.
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Apr 15 1999
